name: vote
description:
Create voting boxes for your designs. Once created, you can vote on your designs via a button in the sidebar.



How do I vote?

1. Select the nodes to vote on.

2. Run the plugin.

3. Style the boxes to your taste.

4. Select the nodes or boxes and vote via the sidebar.


Who can vote?

Anyone who has write access to your document. Users with read-only access unfortunately cannot vote.


Can I vote from presentation view or put a link into my presentation?

Unfortunately not (yet).


What if someone removes the plugin-section from the sidebar or deletes the box?

You can simply run the plugin on the original node again. The voting score will be recovered.


What will users that don't have the plugin installed see?

Users still see a plugin section in the sidebar, stating 'Install vote'
